includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: FBI Agent Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson) is sent to debunk 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity reopened by Agent Fox Mulder (David Duchovny).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: FBI Agent Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson) is sent to debunk 'The X-Files': investigations into the paranormal led by Agent Fox Mulder (David Duchovny).
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: FBI Agent Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson) is sent to debunk 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity reopened by Agent Fox Mulder (David Duchovny).

includedAssets.title: Deep Throat
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the mysterious case of a military test pilot who disappeared after experiencing strange psychotic behaviour.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the mysterious case of a military test pilot who disappeared after experiencing strange psychotic behaviour.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the mysterious case of a military test pilot who disappeared after experiencing strange psychotic behaviour.

includedAssets.title: Squeeze
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully search for a humanoid killer whose savage murder spree re-occurs every thirty years.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully search for a humanoid killer whose savage murder spree re-occurs every thirty years.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully search for a humanoid killer whose savage murder spree re-occurs every thirty years.

includedAssets.title: Conduit
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder becomes obsessed with solving a case that closely parallels an 'encounter' he experienced as a child.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder becomes obsessed with solving a case that closely parallels an 'encounter' he experienced as a child.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder becomes obsessed with solving a case that closely parallels an 'encounter' he experienced as a child.

includedAssets.title: The Jersey Devil
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully track a legendary creature that has roamed the New Jersey countryside for over forty years.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully track a legendary creature that has roamed the New Jersey countryside for over forty years.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully track a legendary creature that has roamed the New Jersey countryside for over forty years.

includedAssets.title: Shadows
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the deaths of two men believed to have been killed by a powerful psychokinetic force.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the deaths of two men believed to have been killed by a powerful psychokinetic force.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the deaths of two men believed to have been killed by a powerful psychokinetic force.

includedAssets.title: Ghost in the Machine
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - Ghost in the Machine
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the death of a corporate executive who may have been murdered by a thinking computer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the death of a corporate executive who may have been murdered by a thinking computer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the death of a corporate executive who may have been murdered by a thinking computer.

includedAssets.title: Ice
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate when a team of geophysicists stationed at a remote Alaskan outpost are killed by a parasitic alien life form.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate when a team of geophysicists stationed at a remote Alaskan outpost are killed by a parasitic alien.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate when a team of geophysicists stationed at a remote Alaskan outpost are killed by a parasitic alien life form.

includedAssets.title: Space
includedAssets.synopsis: When a space shuttle mission is sabotaged, Mulder suspects it is the work of an evil extraterrestrial spirit inhabiting the body of a former astronaut.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a space shuttle mission is sabotaged, Mulder suspects an evil extraterrestrial spirit is inhabiting the body of a former astronaut.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a space shuttle mission is sabotaged, Mulder suspects it is the work of an evil extraterrestrial spirit inhabiting the body of a former astronaut.

includedAssets.title: Fallen Angel
includedAssets.synopsis: Scully and Mulder investigate a possible UFO crash site which Mulder believes the government is trying to cover up.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Scully and Mulder investigate a possible UFO crash site which Mulder believes the government is trying to cover up.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Scully and Mulder investigate a possible UFO crash site which Mulder believes the government is trying to cover up.

includedAssets.title: Eve
includedAssets.synopsis: Two identical murders occur at exactly the same time on two different coasts, and Mulder suspects supernatural involvement.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two identical murders occur at exactly the same time on two different coasts, and Mulder suspects supernatural involvement.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Two identical murders occur at exactly the same time on two different coasts, and Mulder suspects supernatural involvement.

includedAssets.title: Fire
includedAssets.synopsis: When several British politicians die in mysterious fires, Mulder and Scully are called in by a Scotland Yard detective and old flame of Fox.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When several British politicians die in mysterious fires, Mulder and Scully are called in by a Scotland Yard detective and old flame of Fox.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When several British politicians die in mysterious fires, Mulder and Scully are called in by a Scotland Yard detective and old flame of Fox.

includedAssets.title: Beyond the Sea
includedAssets.synopsis: After two North Carolina students are kidnapped by a serial killer, Scully and Mulder seek the help of a convicted murderer awaiting execution.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After two North Carolina students are kidnapped by a serial killer, Scully and Mulder seek the help of a convicted murderer awaiting execution.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After two North Carolina students are kidnapped by a serial killer, Scully and Mulder seek the help of a convicted murderer awaiting execution.

includedAssets.title: Gender Bender
includedAssets.synopsis: A religious sect member capable of changing gender becomes the prime suspect after a murder spree.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A religious sect member capable of changing gender becomes the prime suspect after a murder spree.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A religious sect member capable of changing gender becomes the prime suspect after a murder spree.

includedAssets.title: Lazarus
includedAssets.synopsis: Scully is disturbed when she senses changes in an old flame, and suspects that he may have been possessed by a dead criminal's spirit.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Scully is disturbed when she senses changes in an old flame, and suspects that he may have been possessed by a dead criminal's spirit.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Scully is disturbed when she senses changes in an old flame, and suspects that he may have been possessed by a dead criminal's spirit.

includedAssets.title: Young at Heart
includedAssets.synopsis: After a criminal whom Mulder helped put away dies in prison, he finds that his actions have come back to haunt him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After a criminal whom Mulder helped put away dies in prison, he finds that his actions have come back to haunt him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After a criminal whom Mulder helped put away dies in prison, he finds that his actions have come back to haunt him.

includedAssets.title: E.B.E.
includedAssets.synopsis: While investigating a possible UFO sighting by a truck driver, Mulder and Scully learn that they are under intense surveillance by parties unknown.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While investigating a possible UFO sighting, Mulder and Scully learn that they are under intense surveillance by parties unknown.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While investigating a possible UFO sighting by a truck driver, Mulder and Scully learn that they are under intense surveillance by parties unknown.

includedAssets.title: Miracle Man
includedAssets.synopsis: The agents investigate a ministry led by a man whose son possesses the power to heal, and to kill, with a touch of his hand.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The agents investigate a ministry led by a man whose son possesses the power to heal, and to kill, with a touch of his hand.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The agents investigate a ministry led by a man whose son possesses the power to heal, and to kill, with a touch of his hand.

includedAssets.title: Shapes
includedAssets.synopsis: The agents track a wolf-like creature linked to a Native American legend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The agents track a wolf-like creature linked to a Native American legend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The agents track a wolf-like creature linked to a Native American legend.

includedAssets.title: Darkness Falls
includedAssets.synopsis: A group of loggers working in a remote forest unearth thousands of deadly insect-like creatures that paralyse and then cocoon their victims.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A group of loggers working in a remote forest unearth thousands of deadly insect-like creatures that paralyse and then cocoon their victims.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A group of loggers working in a remote forest unearth thousands of deadly insect-like creatures that paralyse and then cocoon their victims.

includedAssets.title: Tooms
includedAssets.synopsis: Eugene Tooms, a supernatural killer whom Mulder helped put in prison, is released on parole.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Eugene Tooms, a supernatural killer whom Mulder helped put in prison, is released on parole.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Eugene Tooms, a supernatural killer whom Mulder helped put in prison, is released on parole.

includedAssets.title: Born Again
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder believes that a young girl with psychokinetic ability is the reincarnation of a man murdered nine years earlier.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mulder believes that a young girl with psychokinetic ability is the reincarnation of a man murdered nine years earlier.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mulder believes that a young girl with psychokinetic ability is the reincarnation of a man murdered nine years earlier.

includedAssets.title: Roland
includedAssets.synopsis: When top scientists at a research lab die under mysterious circumstances, the agents suspect a mentally challenged janitor may somehow be the culprit.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When scientists at a research lab die under mysterious circumstances, the agents suspect a mentally challenged janitor may somehow be the culprit.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When top scientists at a research lab die under mysterious circumstances, the agents suspect a mentally challenged janitor may somehow be the culprit.

includedAssets.title: The Erlenmeyer Flask
includedAssets.synopsis: Deep Throat gives Mulder a lead on a critically important case involving the cloning of extra-terrestrial viruses.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Deep Throat gives Mulder a lead on a critically important case involving the cloning of extra-terrestrial viruses.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Deep Throat gives Mulder a lead on a critically important case involving the cloning of extra-terrestrial viruses.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: FBI Agent Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson) is sent to debunk 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity reopened by Agent Fox Mulder (David Duchovny). Smash-hit sci-fi series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: FBI Agent Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson) is assigned to 'The X-Files': cases of the possibly paranormal reopened by Agent Fox Mulder (David Duchovny).
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: FBI Agent Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson) is sent to debunk 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity reopened by Agent Fox Mulder (David Duchovny). Smash-hit sci-fi series.

includedIn.title: The X-Files
includedIn.synopsis: Sceptic FBI Agent Dana Scully is sent to work on 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity led by Agent Fox Mulder, while an unexplained force works to thwart the duo’s efforts.
